Package index

Application

run_app()
Run Shiny app

Graph operations

df2graph()
Convert transitions data frame into an hgraph matrix
hgraph_palette()
Adaptive color palette generator for hGraph

Shiny UI components

navbarFluidPage()
Create a page with a top level navigation bar within a fluid container
headerCard()
Card with header
renderRcode() rcodeOutput()
Render R code with syntax highlighting
renderRmd() rmdOutput()
Render R Markdown with syntax highlighting

Matrix buttons

Text input addon

File input button

Help popovers

Input/output utilities

arithmetic_to_numeric()
Convert arithmetic (character) format to numeric
sanitize_filename()
Sanitizes file name
